item.title: eHealth TABLET: A Developing Country Perspective in Managing the Development and Deployment of a Mobile - Cloud Electronic Medical Record for Local Government Units
item.description:
M.R. Estuar, D. Batangan, A. Coronel, F.E.V. Castro, A.C. Amarra, R.A.C. Caliso, and J.P. Vergara. eHealth TABLET: A Developing Country Perspective in Managing the Development and Deployment of a Mobile – Cloud Electronic Medical Record for Local Government Units. 15th IEEE International Conference on Mobile Data Management (Brisbane, Australia. 15-18 July 2014).

IEEE MDM 2014

item.title: Bottom up Approach and Devolved Design of a Health Information System: eHealth TABLET
item.description:
M.R.E. Estuar, D.B. Batangan, A.A. Coronel, A.C.M. Amarra, and F.E.V.G. Castro. Bottom up Approach and Devolved Design of a Health Information System: eHealth TABLET. Lecture Notes in Computer Science. Springer. Vol. 8211. 2013. International Conference on Brain & Health Informatics (Maebashi Terrsa, Chiyodamachi, Maebashi City, Gunma, Japan, October 29-31, 2013).

BHI 2013

item.title: An Analysis of Java Programming Behaviors, Affect, Perceptions, and Syntax Errors among Low-Achieving, Average and High-Achieving Novice Programmers
item.description:
M.M. Rodrigo, T.C. Andallaza, F.E.V.G. Castro, M. Armenta, T. Dy, and M. Jadud. An Analysis of Java Programming Behaviors, Affect, Perceptions, and Syntax Errors among Low-Achieving, Average and High-Achieving Novice Programmers. Journal of Educational Computing Research. Vol. 49, No. 3, pp. 293-325. 2013.

JECR

item.title: A Study on the Effect of Exit Widths and Crowd Sizes in the Formation of Arch in Clogged Crowds

August 2013. 6th Symposium on the Mathematical Aspects of Computer Science (Boracay Island, Aklan, Philippines, December 4-8, 2012).

PCJ

item.title: Microsimulations of Arching, Clogging, and Bursty Exit Phenomena in Crowd Dynamics
item.description:
F.E.V.G. Castro and J.P. Pabico. Microsimulations of Arching, Clogging, and Bursty Exit Phenomena in Crowd Dynamics. Philippine Information Technology Journal. Vol. 6, No. 1, pp. 11-16. NCTIE 2012 CFP

item.title: A Microsimulation Study on the Effects of Exit Door Number and Dimensions on Student Egress from a Large Lecture Hall
item.description: F.E.V.G. Castro and J.P. Pabico. A Microsimulation Study on the Effects of Exit Door Number and Dimensions on Student Egress from a Large Lecture Hall. In Proceedings of the 5th UPLB CAS Student-Faculty Research Conference. (University of the Philippines Los Baños, College, Laguna, December 14, 2012). Best Paper.
